alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:49PM EDT until July 11 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT/615 PM CDT/ FOR NORTHEASTERN DICKINSON...NORTHWESTERN DELTA AND SOUTHEASTERN MARQUETTE COUNTIES... At 649 PM EDT/549 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Gwinn, or 22 miles south of Marquette, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... K. I. Sawyer Airport, Rock, Gwinn, Skandia, McFarland, Anderson Lake, Lathrop, Little Lake, Carlshend and Big Bass Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
